# Cross Lagged Panel Modelle

```{r}
library(lavaan)
library(haven)
library(semPlot)

# read complete data
data_star_sampled <- read_spss("data/data_star_sampled.sav")

clp0_mod <- "g3tmathss ~ g2tmathss
             g3treadss ~ g2treadss
             
             g3tmathss ~ g2treadss
             g3treadss ~ g2tmathss"

clp0_fit <- sem(clp0_mod, data = data_star_sampled)

semPaths(clp0_fit, what = "std", fade = F)

parameterEstimates(clp0_fit, standardized = T)

summary(clp0_fit, rsquare = T, std = T)
```
